we_serve_immigrants: We serve immigrants in Colorado Springs with new and gently-used clothing and we drive it to your home! Simply provide the age, height, and sizes for each person. When the order is ready, a driver will text you with possible times for delivery. Be sure to reply to the driver's text.
with_name_and_phone: with your name and phone number, and let us know if you would prefer a pickup or drop-off.
donate_wishlist: Want to donate from our wish lists?
days_times: Please select what days and the time that you can receive a delivery
please_add: Please add below one entry for each person in the household.
child_or_adult: Do they wear Adult or Child Sizes?
name: Name
male_or_female_clothing: Does the person wear male or female clothing
hat_coat_gloves: Check if you would like a Hat, Coat, or Gloves?
anything_else: Is there anything else you would like? Are there colors/styles you especially like? You may also request Baby blankets, Dresses, Skirts, Shorts, Sweaters, Pajamas, Maternity, Jackets, Neck Ties, Scarves, Boots, Sandals, and Purses.
request_has_been_sent: Your request has now been submitted! Please keep an eye out for a text from one of our volunteers.
error_text: Sorry, it looks like there was an error submitting your request. Please try submitting one more time. If it still doesn't work, please reach out to us at mobileclothes@bmccs.org.
beth_el_1: Mobile Clothes is a ministry of
beth_el_3: , serving immigrants in Colorado Springs. Feel free to reach out to us with any questions at
